lyric:
[by:LEFTWords]
[00:11.37]We are runnin' so fast
[00:14.10]And we never look back
[00:17.00]And whatever I lack, you make up
[00:23.03]We make a really good team
[00:26.04]And though not everyone sees
[00:28.92]We got this crazy chemistry
[00:31.88]Between us
[00:35.48]Jump starting your car cause this city's a bore
[00:38.19]Buying e-cigarettes at the convenience store
[00:41.21]Making new clichés on our own little tour
[00:44.21]Let's ride
[00:48.46]You don't have to say I love you to say I love you
[00:53.99]Forget all the shooting stars and all the silver moons
[00:59.79]We've been making shades of purple out of red and blue
[01:05.89]Sickeningly sweet like honey, don't need money
[01:09.86]All I need is you
[01:15.60]All I need is you
[01:22.70]We try staying up late
[01:25.18]But we both are light weights
[01:28.19]Yeah we get off our face, too easy
[01:34.06]And we take jokes way too far
[01:36.99]And sometimes living's too hard
[01:39.94]We're like two halves of one heart
[01:47.40]You don't have to say I love you to say I love you
[01:53.26]Forget all the shooting stars and all the silver moons
[01:59.20]We've been making shades of purple out of red and blue
[02:05.15]Sickeningly sweet like honey, don't need money
[02:09.08]All I need is you
[02:14.80]All I need is you
[02:21.00][AllDay:]
[02:22.96]Eat a pill stay and chill you don't needa go
[02:25.38]I'm about to bring emo back if you leave my home
[02:28.22]I'd panic at the disco and you'd rather watch a tv show
[02:31.21]Then ill squeeze your booty real hard like I'm kneading dough
[02:34.75]Pizza boy, I'm speeding for ya
[02:37.49]We canna get married tonight if you really wanna
[02:40.64]Me in a cheap suit like a sleazy lawyer
[02:43.52]And if you break my lil heart, it’d be an honour
[02:46.91]You don't have to say I love you to say I love you
[02:52.49]Forget all the shooting stars and all the silver moons
[02:58.52]We've been making shades of purple out of red and blue
[03:04.42]Sickeningly sweet like honey, don't need money
[03:08.20]All I need is you
[03:14.05]All I need is you
tlyric:
[by:DREAMENGXIAO]
[00:11.37]行色匆匆
[00:14.10]从不回望
[00:17.00]我所有的缺憾，都有你补充
[00:23.03]你我合作得紧密无缺
[00:26.04]世人虽未都见得
[00:28.92]你我之间
[00:31.88]有狂热的化学吸引力
[00:35.48]跳入你车里，发动引擎，这城市实在无趣
[00:38.19]便利店里，买下几只电子香烟
[00:41.21]这次双人短途旅行，陈词滥调，也未谈厌
[00:44.21]一起飞驰吧
[00:48.46]你不必靠说“我爱你”来表达“我爱你”
[00:53.99]纵天上流星飞驰，银月悬挂，我们也都忘掉
[00:59.79]你我一起，就可筑起逃离蓝红二色的紫色庇荫
[01:05.89]这（感情）甜得像蜜，金钱也可抛
[01:09.86]除了你，我什么也不要
[01:15.60]除了你，我什么也不要
[01:22.70]我们学着彻夜不睡
[01:25.18]你我只是无足轻重之人
[01:28.19]但却撕开面具，对彼此坦诚
[01:34.06]一路漫漫，你我以玩笑相伴，也有欢声笑语
[01:36.99]就算时有生活不易
[01:39.94]你我也是各占彼此心中一半
[01:47.40]你不必靠说“我爱你”来表达“我爱你”
[01:53.26]纵天上流星飞驰，银月悬挂，我们也都忘掉
[01:59.20]你我一起，就可筑起逃离蓝红二色的紫色庇荫
[02:05.15]这（感情）甜得像蜜，金钱也可抛
[02:09.08]除了你，我什么也不要
[02:14.80]除了你，我什么也不要
[02:22.96]吃下这片小药丸，留下吧，外面尚有寒意，你可别离开呀
[02:25.38]要是你弃我而去，我便情绪不定，怅然若失
[02:28.22]虽然我是忠于迪斯科，你更乐意看电视
[02:31.21]可我愿意像揉面团那样，紧紧地抱着你
[02:34.75]Pizza男孩，我心跳加速也只为你
[02:37.49]如果你真的愿意，我们今晚就去领证结婚
[02:40.64]我虽身着破旧西装，也算像个庸俗律师
[02:43.52]假使你伤透我心，也是我的至上荣耀
[02:46.91]你不必靠说“我爱你”来表达“我爱你”
[02:52.49]纵天上流星飞驰，银月悬挂，我们也都忘掉
[02:58.52]你我一起，就可筑起逃离蓝红二色的紫色庇荫
[03:04.42]这（感情）甜得像蜜，金钱也可抛
[03:08.20]除了你，我什么也不要
[03:14.05]除了你，我什么也不要
